details.creator: veraPDF Consortium
details.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.6.2.3 Schemas - Container schema
details.description: Extension schemas shall be specified using the PDF/A extension schema container schema defined in 6.6.2.3.3. All fields described in each of the tables in 6.6.2.3.3 shall be present in any extension schema container schema.

rule.description: Extension schemas shall be specified using the PDF/A extension schema container schema defined in 6.6.2.3.3. All fields described in each of the tables in 6.6.2.3.3 shall be present in any extension schema container schema.

error.message: An extension schema object contains fields not defined by the specification
